svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/89.0.4389.114 Safari/537.36" version="8.5.3" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 关键参数指定： 备份根目录、目标备份名、临时目录路径

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 分析备份信息文件(backup_info)， 找出所有相关备份目录

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 将所有备份文件依序拷贝至临时目录

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 根据backup_info文件记录的信息，判断xlog文件的完整性

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: 根据manifest文件记录的信息，判断所有备份文件的完整性

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 43px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
